# ciImage

**Instance Property**

The underlying Core Image data.

## Declaration

```swift
var ciImage: CIImage? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the `UIImage` object was initialized using a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGImage], the value of the property is `nil`.

## Getting the image data

- **cgImage**: The underlying Quartz image data.
- **images**: The complete array of image objects that compose the animation of an animated object.
- **imageAsset**: The image asset (if any) for the image.
